Motivation - Story.
notes.description: Let me tell you a quick story! A journey of a thousand miles always begins with a single step, Our Journey begin back in 2019 when my network peers & I were trying to make connections with Brilliant people in the events, fairs and exhibitions, however the challenge was we had to save every single time manually, and frankly it was a pain in the A** and then light Bulb turned ON, and we decide to bring our idea into the reality, and finally we went live on Oct 2021 and since then we are on the mission to bring change in the life of enthusiasts like YOU, who loves to present and connect with Speed! - Paper business card is old school (save nature with us)
